import Header from "./Header" import Footer from "./Footer" import { useState } from "react" const Register = (props) => { const [formValue, setFormValue] = useState({ email: '', password: '', }) const handleChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setFormValue({ ...formValue, [name]: value, }) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const { username, password, email } = formValue Aut.register(username, password, email) } return (

Регистрация

) } export default Register
